meanings.definition: Defeated or outperformed someone or something.
meanings.sent1: In the race, Sarah bested all her friends.
meanings.sent2: He bested his opponent in the chess match.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel bested the cat in a nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: The sun bested the clouds, shining brightly through the day.
meanings.sent5: The little ant bested the big grasshopper in a strength competition.

meanings.definition: Surpassed or exceeded in achievement or skill.
meanings.sent1: She was the bested student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The bested team won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The bested cake was so delicious that everyone wanted more.
meanings.sent4: His bested performance on the stage left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The bested artist's painting was a masterpiece admired by all.
